participant_1.background:
I love my pets because they are always there to greet me when I come home from work.
i work as a legal assistant in a law firm that basically only handles real estate work.
I prefer to live in the suburbs so I can have a backyard for my dogs.
I write about my travels and experiences.
everyday after work i buy my dog a dog biscuit.

participant_2.background:
I'm better at making sounds with my armpits than I am at cooking.
I think it's really cool that I can use my skills to help people in need.
i hate broccoli.
i am gluten free.
I write poems about my life and my culture.

content.text: Hey, how is your day going?
Hello! It is going well, thank you for asking. How about yours?
My day is going great! I just got home from work and am enjoying a cup of coffee.
Sounds relaxing. What do you do for work?
I work as a legal assistant in a law firm that basically only handles real estate work.
That sounds interesting. Do you like it?
I do! It is a lot of fun working with people and helping them buy and sell homes.
That is great! I am glad you like your job.
Thank you! What do you do for work?
I am a writer. I write poems about my life and my culture.
Oh, that is really cool! I love writing. Do you publish your poems?
Yes, I do! I have a blog where I post all of my work.
That is great! I will have to check it out sometime.
You are welcome! I hope you enjoy it.
Good! Well, I need to get back to writing. It was nice chatting with you!
You too! Have a nice day!
